## Code Quality

<!-- Verify code quality standards -->

- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Code passes linting checks (`ruff check` for backend, `pnpm lint` for frontend)
- [ ] No commented-out code or debug statements remain
- [ ] Code has been formatted (`ruff format` for backend)
- [ ] TypeScript types are properly defined (if frontend change)
- [ ] Added/updated docstrings and comments where needed
- [ ] No new warnings introduced

---

## Backend Checklist

<!-- If this PR includes backend changes, verify: -->

- [ ] Virtual environment activated and dependencies installed
- [ ] `pytest` passes without errors
- [ ] `ruff check .` passes without errors
- [ ] `ruff format .` has been run
- [ ] API endpoints have proper type hints and docstrings
- [ ] New environment variables added to `.env.example` (if any)
- [ ] Backend README updated (if needed)

---

## Frontend Checklist

<!-- If this PR includes frontend changes, verify: -->

- [ ] Dependencies installed with `pnpm install`
- [ ] `pnpm lint` passes without errors
- [ ] `pnpm build` succeeds without errors
- [ ] TypeScript compiler shows no errors
- [ ] Components are properly typed
- [ ] Responsive design tested (mobile, tablet, desktop)
- [ ] Accessibility (a11y) considerations addressed
- [ ] Frontend README updated (if needed)
